slide2.line2: Try us for a masterful dance weekend!

about.title: About the congress
about.subtitle: Get a taste of non stop action!
about.par1: What's the plan here? Simple. We have arranged everything to give you the best Gala experience in the night, and we keep the party going the entire time!! We simply will not close at all. This means you can dance in at least 1 area during the day.
about.par2: If you have been to a salsa congress before, you may be one of the people that simply want to continue dancing as long as they can. And that is excatly what we will provide. Of course there will be opportunities for workshops. We invited a number of artists to help us out with that :)

1.title: You know best
1.summary: We know salsa, parties and workshops. Tell us what YOU want.

2.title: Become an ambassador
2.summary: Keep it tight. Provide your friends with a discount.

3.title: Get your passes
3.summary: Secure your part of the action now! Click here to see the ticket plans.

1.title: Olu Olu
1.summary: Your host of the event!! Some say it's not a congress if he is not present.

2.title: Jose Diaz and Nerea Perez
2.summary: Coming straight from Milan, one of europe's capital cities of Mambo, these guys need little introduction...

3.title: Mr Marsies Mambo
3.summary: Interested in some NY ON2 dancing? Skills improvement guaranteed at Marlon Borkulo aka Mr Marsies Mambo workshops

4.title: Paul and Eveline
4.summary: Dance in one of the purest forms. These guys fuse a variety of styles going from Salsa to Kizomba with a hiphop flavor.

5.title: Dora Egressy
5.summary: Small, but packs a good punch when it comes to Cuban, Street dance, or Ladies Styling.

6.title: Anja Lohrum
6.summary: Passionate all round dancer both in teaching and on the dancefloor. You will not forget a dance with her :)

7.title: JJ Pachanga
7.summary: Energetic style combined with a lavish display of showmanship. Don't miss his footwork classes...

8.title: Jean Paul
8.summary: Jean-Paul is an energetic, salsa dancer who has danced for over a decade. Renown for his positvie energy and passion for dancing and teaching.

9.title: Sisa and Marian
9.summary: Salsa or Kizomba? You got it

10.title: M√°rio Jord√£o et Laury Esmeralda.
10.summary: Bringing you kizomba true to the Angolan tradition. A vision of African dance soothed and uninhibited

1.title: DJ Jarzino
1.summary: DJ Jarzino brings a wide variety of latin sounds that keeps you on the floor

2.title: DJ Lindt
2.summary: DJ Lindt will provide a fine mix of Semba, Tarraxinha, and some Ghetto Zouk :)

3.title: DJ Mambonito
3.summary: Mambonito will make sure all the necessary Mambo and Latin Jazz will get out there to get your groove on.

4.title: DJ Maya
4.summary: With DJ Maya all the salseros will go home with a satisfied feeling. No one gets left out when he plays

5.title: DJ Donnie
5.summary: You can count on DJ Donnie to bring the mambo if he is asked to do so.

6.title: DJ Freelancer
6.summary: Music addict who firmly believes in playing for dancers first!

7.title: DJ Csedi
7.summary: DJ Csedi is one of the most well known name in the Hungarian salsa community. A good Cuban room hardly exists without him :)

8.title: DJ Jaro
8.summary: Frequently DJing and master of Rueda. Jaro is a member of the international 'That's what she said'.

9.title: DJ Caly
9.summary: Well known Cuban DJ in Slovakia. His mix is one of the most wanted on the Cuban floor.

10.title: DJ Supaman
10.summary: Real kizomba addict. DJ-ing all over europe, he is also organizer of Bratislava's - TOMA TOMA festival!

footersocial.intro: Bratislava Salsa International - A world class salsa congress dedicated to make you dance!

home.frmsuccess: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
home.registerhere: Register here, upon entering the venue

mc-olu-olu.title: Host of the event: the famous Olu Olu!
mc-olu-olu.headline: Olu Olu MC
mc-olu-olu.smry: Some say he can be at two places at the same time. Some say he sets the sole quality European Salsa Congress standard
mc-olu-olu.smryb: All we know, is that he will be our event host at SBI
mc-olu-olu.par: Olu Olu may the most iconic presence at any given congress. If you walk past a crowded hotel lobby with lots of people dressed for Gala, and Olu is amongst them, this is a salsa congress. No doubt.
mc-olu-olu.parquote: What should we play in the Mambo room...?s
mc-olu-olu.parquoter: Olu lounge makes a better dance climate (for the dancers)
mc-olu-olu.parb: You may know him from a congress somewhere in Europe hosting the Olu Lounge often on a sunday afternoon. The Olu Lounge is his mission to make the world a better place for dancers :) We asked Olu to help guide you through all the commotion and he agreed to pacify the waves of excitement with his soothing voice :)

marsiesmambo.title: Mr Marsies Mambo the On2 Sergeant
marsiesmambo.headline: Marlon Borkulo
marsiesmambo.smry: Ready? Set? Sweat! After that we shine
marsiesmambo.parquote: We will repeat it 10 more times

dj-lindt.title: Kizomba's most wanted from the Netherlands
dj-lindt.headline: DJ Lindt

paul-and-eveline.title: Salsa Fusion
paul-and-eveline.headline: AfriSur
paul-and-eveline.smry: Express Yourself! That is what AfriSur Dance Company is about.
paul-and-eveline.par: For us, it means that dance is fun, a release, a moment of pure flow and a form of art. And we LOVE to create this art! Using a broad foundation in salsa, mambo, cha cha and hiphop and under the inspiring direction of Paul 'Mr Smooth' Baarn, we explore and enjoy dance: in performance, teaching and social dancing in every shape and form.
paul-and-eveline.parb: This means that if you see AfriSur Dance Company somewhere, we will most likely be dancing (or teaching), we will most likely be smiling and we will always be open to what the dance can bring. Whether those are our cool and funky shows with strong body movement or musicality... or maybe you'll meet us in a class or workshop on styling, flow & play or smooth musicality... or maybe on the floor during a cool song! Our focus will always be on the ability to express yourself and to create something fun and gorgeous every time you dance. Wherever and whenever it is that you will meet AfriSur Dance Company, we look forward to bringing you along in our mission to Express Yourself!

dj-mambonito.title: Mambo and Latin jazz for dinner
dj-mambonito.headline: DJ Mambonito

dj-maya.title: Salsa Dura with mambo
dj-maya.headline: DJ Maya
dj-maya.smryb: Easy going and steady sound. Thats DJ Maya
dj-maya.par: It doesn't matter if you only have basic salsa knowledge, or if you are a die-hard salsero sporting tricks and dips. If you have that mambo heart, you will not get a second of boredom with his set. Just step in the room and breathe it in.
dj-maya.parb: DJ Maya comes fully equipped. If he decides to go old skool, he will break out the vinyls, but he also sports a dj controller / laptop setup, complemented by a plethora of professional sound equipment to pump up the party.

dj-donnie.title: Lets get it started!
dj-donnie.headline: DJ Donnie
dj-donnie.smryb: Make sure you entertain the dancers
dj-donnie.par: You can count on DJ Donnie to bring the mambo if he is asked to do so. He is an expert in walking the path between fulfilling the musical mission while keeping the dancers entertained.
dj-donnie.parquote: Give the dancers all the salsa they desire
dj-donnie.parb: Before he was a DJ, Donnie was (and still is) a dancer. He is well versed in your favorite salsa styles, and always manages to surprise with a few instant hits which takes dancing to the next level.

dj-freelancer.title: Musically addicted!
dj-freelancer.headline: DJ Freelancer
dj-freelancer.par: I am really addicted to good music independently from the genre, I believe first of all a DJ must play for the dancers, so when I play music I always check if I'd love to hear that on the dance floor.

jean-paul.title: Positive energy and passion
jean-paul.headline: Jean Paul
jean-paul.smry: He strives for a healthy mixture between technique and fun.
jean-paul.par: Inspired by his Cuban, Antillean and Surinam heritage and hearing son, son montuno, bolero, mambo and the modern name 'Salsa' music at home  he developed a passion for the music as a child. But it wasn't until 2005 that he started dancing salsa. Since then he performed many times with several groups across Europe on the biggest stages salsa knows. After 4 years of performing he took a break to reinvent his passion and to educate himself in the beautiful artform we call Salsa.
jean-paul.parquote: Basic knowledge about our own body and mind and makes us strong
jean-paul.parb: Floraci√≥n(Blossom), the dance company  which resides in Germany believes that dance and music brings people together beyond borders. They believe that dance teaches us basic knowledge about our own body and mind and makes us strong. There aim is to pass on development and fun to you, regardless of level or age, so that you can blossom like a beautiful flower and flourish in full force.

mario-laury.headline: Mario and Laury
mario-laury.smry: This is what a TV program from Angola had to say about these two Kizomba champions: They came from France and Slovenia and dance our Semba and Kizomba with the mastery of the great performers.
mario-laury.parquote: No art is inaccessible, ... for he who has the means to learn

dj-supaman.title: DJ Supaman
dj-supaman.headline: √Ålvaro Gustavo is: DJ Supaman!
dj-supaman.par: Catch him if you prefer classics or real deep and dangerous tarraxinha. By the way, he is also an organizer of one of those great and regular festivals in Bratislava - TOMA TOMA

dj-jaro.title: One of Bratislava's pioneering rueda teachers. DJ and Fanatic!
dj-jaro.headline: DJ Jaro
dj-jaro.smry: Jaro has been DJ-ing and teaching in various locations, Starting out locally at Nor's Rueda Congress,  Balaton (Hungary), leading out to Oslo (Norway) and Roskilde, Denmark, and all the way to Boston Rueda festival (US)
dj-jaro.par: Jaro has a wonderful energy in his classes and loves to dance to son, salsaton and timba. He got an eye for details and offers something extra for both leaders and followers. He teaches his art in in Bratislava covering both partner work and rueda de casino at all levels.
dj-jaro.parquote: Gotta stop tucking in my shirt...

about-workshops.title: Workshops
about-workshops.subtitle: Upgrade your skills! Don't have any? We can fix that.
about-workshops.par: We have invited a wide variety of artists from all over Europe who will come down ready to jam. They have wicked skills all over the dance spectrum from Salsa to Kizomba to Hip Hop. They're also ready to cram some of those skills down your skillset. For more detailed information take a look at the workshop schedule when made available.

about-shows.title: Shows
about-shows.subtitle: The key is to have just enough of the right quality put together...
about-shows.par: As soon as we have done that, we will list that here.

about-parties.title: Daytime socials
about-parties.subtitle: What is a daytime social?
about-parties.par: Did we mention that we won't stop the party? We won't. Really. The party continues. There's no afterparty. It just does not end :)
about-parties.parb: Everyone 'knows' that a Salsa Gala is in the night. So we will do exactly that. But when the day starts, we will simply transfer into another mood and make sure you can dance all day, should you want to. That's what we call a Daytime Social.

tickets.notickets: Wow! Great that you want to buy a ticket! Tell us how to reach you and we will contact you as soon as we have them ready.

cart.title: Your order
cart.lblcpdesc: Enter your promo code here for discount.
cart.lblcartempty: You have not ordered any items
cart.payment-b-desc: Make your payment directly into our bank account. Please use your Order ID as the payment reference. You will receive your order by email the funds have cleared in our account.
cart.payment-c-desc: Your pass will be reserved. Collect it before the event during opening hours.
cart.payment-p-desc: We accept PayPal payments, making use of EventImperium.sk as our payment provider.
cart.payment-summary: You will receive an email confirming your order. This email contains further instructions and payment options to complete your order, and will be sent to
cart.cart-thankyou: Thank you for contributing to the movement. We hope to meet you there in person!

1.title: Terms
1.p1: By accessing this web site, you are agreeing to be bound by these web site Terms and Conditions of Use, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site. The materials contained in this web site are protected by applicable copyright and trade mark law.

2.title: Disclaimer
2.p1: The materials on Bratislava Salsa International's web site are provided "as is". Bratislava Salsa International makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties, including without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights. Further, Bratislava Salsa International does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its Internet web site or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.
2.p2: The materials appearing on Bratislava Salsa International's web site could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Bratislava Salsa International does not warrant that any of the materials on its web site are accurate, complete, or current. Bratislava Salsa International may make changes to the materials contained on its web site at any time without notice. Bratislava Salsa International does not, however, make any commitment to update the materials.

3.title: Limitations
3.p1: In no event shall Bratislava Salsa International or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption,) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Bratislava Salsa International's Internet site, even if Bratislava Salsa International or a Bratislava Salsa International authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.
3.p2: Bratislava Salsa International has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its Internet web site and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by Bratislava Salsa International of the site. Use of any such linked web site is at the user's own risk.

1.title: Regarding personal data
1.p1: Your privacy is very important to us. Accordingly, we have developed this Policy in order for you to understand how we collect, use, communicate and disclose and make use of personal information. The following outlines our privacy policy.
1.p2: LISTTBefore or at the time of collecting personal information, we will identify the purposes for which information is being collected.; We will collect and use of personal information solely with the objective of fulfilling those purposes specified by us, unless we obtain the consent of the individual concerned or as required by law.; We will only retain personal information as long as necessary for the fulfillment of those purposes.; We will collect personal information by lawful and fair means and, where appropriate, with the knowledge or consent of the individual concerned.; We will protect personal information by reasonable security safeguards against loss or theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.; We will make readily available to customers information about our policies and practices relating to the management of personal information.

2.title: How secure is my data?
2.p1: We are taking great care in protecting your data. Any data will be transferred via SSL connections in order to avoid manipulation by third parties.

by-car.title: Car
by-car.summary: How to get there by car

where-to-stay.title: Where to stay
where-to-stay.p1: Below we have listed a few hotels nearby. All of the listed hotels are fair priced and within 15 minutes walking of the congress venue.

1.name: Hotel Astra
1.desc: Unfussy hotel offering laid-back rooms & apartments with free Wi-Fi, plus a Chinese restaurant.

2.name: Hotel Aston
2.desc: Modern rooms in a contemporary lodging offering a chic restaurant & a gym, plus 3 meeting rooms.

3.name: Holiday Inn Bratislava
3.desc: Subdued rooms in a relaxed hotel with a restaurant, 2 bars, an indoor pool & a tennis court.

4.name: Hotel Blue II
4.desc: Bright rooms in a laid-back, contemporary hotel with complimentary breakfast & Wi-Fi.

ambassadors.h32t: Earn free workshop or party access
ambassadors.h33t: We just want you to be part of the revolution. :)
ambassadors.frmpref: Tell us a bit about your style
ambassadors.frmintro: We will email you the details of our ambassador program.
ambassadors.frmoutro: Your data is safe with us. Read our privacy policy!

3.title: Deodorant
3.desc: Restrooms will be equipped with a few backup units of D.E.O. :)

4.title: Smoking
4.desc: Outside please. But we will provide cover for you.

5.title: Photo Hotspot
5.desc: Grow your fame. Take a picture

6.title: Ticket Roulette
6.desc: Every ticket automatically enters a lottery to win the ticket price back

7.title: Raincheck
7.desc: Got passes and can't make it? No problem. Next year you can still use it

8.title: Taxi Call spot
8.desc: Don't feel like walking back to the hotel? Go to the desk and have a taxi called
